US 'disappointed' by Hungary's Ukraine policy, urges ratification of Sweden's NATO bidThe United States is "disappointed" by Hungarian Prime Minister Viktor Orban's Ukraine policy, and looks forward to Budapest fulfilling its promise not to be the last to ratify Sweden's NATO accession, a senior U.S. State Department official said on Thursday. Thu, 11 Jan 2024 17:50:58 GMT 2EPQEHVP7VPFHFU7F2I2U57NRA https://www.reuters.com/world/us-disappointed-by-hungarys-ukraine-policy-urges-ratification-sweden-nato-bid-2024-01-11/Reuters世界
Ecuador security forces conduct raids as prison guards remain hostageMilitary and police operations took place around Ecuador on Thursday in response to a wave of violence and the detention of nearly 180 prison staff by inmates, with the government pledging to wage war on crime gangs they blame for the unrest. Thu, 11 Jan 2024 17:35:47 GMT SUPUGW5OL5IAJIBXTQLAIBWL6Y https://www.reuters.com/world/americas/ecuador-security-forces-conduct-raids-prison-guards-remain-hostage-2024-01-11/Alexandra Valencia世界美洲
Finnish presidential frontrunner Stubb seeks a 'more European' NATOFinnish presidential frontrunner Alexander Stubb said on Thursday NATO should become "more European" and that his country would remain an important partner for the United States whether or not Donald Trump is re-elected. Thu, 11 Jan 2024 17:33:33 GMT XXLMBHQPQJM7ZHYEGDJYXEND https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/finnish-presidential-frontrunner-stubb-seeks-more-european-nato-2024-01-11/Anne Kauranen世界欧洲
Exhausted Gaza medics struggle to help casualties from Israeli bombardmentInjured Palestinians pour into al-Aqsa Hospital in Deir al-Balah in the central Gaza Strip as exhausted medics try to help casualties from Israel's ground assault and bombardment. Thu, 11 Jan 2024 17:28:04 GMT EEDHWGTWJVIRTPBJYTWM7ZDRLQ https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/exhausted-gaza-medics-struggle-help-casualties-israeli-bombardment-2024-01-11/Mohammed Al-Masri, Maggie Fick世界中东地区
Romania to remain biggest alternative export route for Ukraine's grain -US officialRomania will remain Ukraine's largest alternative export route for grains and other goods in addition to Kyiv's own Black Sea corridor, a senior U.S. State Department official said on Thursday. Thu, 11 Jan 2024 17:27:24 GMT IEYFIKK2BRK57HBBNHB3QHDOMA https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/romania-remains-biggest-alternative-export-route-ukraine-grain-us-official-2024-01-11/Reuters世界欧洲
Bailiffs seize Belgian minister's freezer, coffee machine in case brought by asylum seekersBailiffs on Thursday seized a freezer and coffee machine from the office of Belgium's junior minister for migration to enforce a court ruling in a case brought by asylum seekers who were left homeless for several months, their lawyer said. Thu, 11 Jan 2024 17:20:44 GMT KKALC5ULIFMRJKZZE434GRDTPM https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/bailiffs-seize-belgian-ministers-freezer-coffee-machine-case-brought-by-asylum-2024-01-11/Charlotte Van Campenhout, Tassilo Hummel世界欧洲
Israeli hostage families shout their love to the captives across Gaza fenceRelatives of Israeli hostages being held by Hamas stood by the Gaza fence on Thursday, taking turns to shout messages of love and support into a microphone in the hope that the captives would hear them. Thu, 11 Jan 2024 17:05:05 GMT OCRIO7J5QJKERE5ZGGPWCJGM6M https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/israeli-hostage-families-shout-their-love-captives-across-gaza-fence-2024-01-11/Reuters世界中东地区
Israel's Netanyahu says hypocrisy and lies on display at World CourtIsraeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu said on Thursday that hypocrisy and lies had been presented to the U.N.'s top court, adding that South Africa's accusation against Israel of genocide in Gaza could only happen in a world turned upside-down. Thu, 11 Jan 2024 16:49:25 GMT NJKLEWT37NK5TNOI6THZF6BAKQ https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/israeli-netanyahu-says-hypocrisy-lies-display-world-court-2024-01-11/Reuters世界中东地区
Thousands protest in Poland against media reform, ex-ministers' imprisonmentThousands of opposition supporters gathered outside Poland's parliament on Thursday to protest against the new government's changes to state media and the imprisonment of two former ministers convicted of abuse of power. Thu, 11 Jan 2024 16:33:51 GMT HQ4L4HPSYJO2PCRFYRP3XXIBFI https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/polish-president-moves-pardon-jailed-ex-ministers-deepening-turmoil-2024-01-11/Anna Koper, Kuba Stezycki世界欧洲
Exclusive: Survivors of mass kidnapping in Mexico recount 'terrifying' experienceHonduran migrant Noel Castillo heard a volley of shots just after 7:30 p.m. in late December as he and his family traveled on a highway in northern Mexico. Through the window, he saw trucks swarm around the bus, trapping them from all sides. Thu, 11 Jan 2024 16:04:02 GMT 7UDJSQFAOFMGJGJZOMOGPPUYD4 https://www.reuters.com/world/americas/survivors-mass-kidnapping-mexico-recount-terrifying-experience-2024-01-11/Laura Gottesdiener世界美洲
Netflix removes Indian film with meat-eating scene after Hindu backlashNetflix has removed an Indian language film from its platform after the movie faced a backlash on social media for depicting the daughter of a Hindu priest eating meat. Thu, 11 Jan 2024 15:24:00 GMT RYTKLCWVR5LXJFZGUC75DED25Y https://www.reuters.com/world/india/netflix-removes-indian-movie-with-meat-eating-scene-after-hindu-backlash-2024-01-11/Reuters世界印度
